author: mrmitch
title: I wouldn't trust this raft to get across a small pond
review: The raft could have been designed better. One must remeber these are aimed at 4-7 year old kids. Set retail price was around $5.00 US dollars, and it fit in nicely with the other 4 Junior Pirate sets we own. Catapult works well. Overall it is what it is, and who its designed for will enjoy it.

author: Smallsam99
title: An  okay set.
review: I got this set for about 1.00 so I'm not complaining. I really only use big-figs as bad guys fighting minifigs but it's good all the same. At first I thought this was a good theme until I saw it was for 4-year olds. It make a three because of basic and good design for a raft, silver sword(persian), and a pirate flag. I still play with it but reagular pirates would have been a lot better.

author: asianlego
title: Shiver me timbers, I ain't no minifig!
review: For AU$5, this set is simply cool. I liked the chrome scimitar and also the raft. Actually, the raft design won't float in water because the base is like chain-link fence - there are many holes on it, although it could do well in a more modern, industrialized setting. The pirate flag is a nice touch - it's printed, which is good as I am sick of stickers. The catapult is not bad and you could fit it nicely into your Castle. The fig is completely useless, unless you have a young son or cousin to give them to. Overall, I think this set is very good except for the fig.

author: modena
title: Not that good.
review:
This set wasn't that good, but it's brown parts will give it a higher rating.

Pros:

  • Nice colours!
  • Very rare plate!
  • Silver-coloured sword!
  • Nice lantern!
  • Functional catapult!

Cons:

  • TOO easy to build!
  • Contains that kind of childish minifigure.

Overall:

This was a satisfactory set. There wasn't much to play with, except for shooting down your sets with this functional catapult. Like all the 4 Juniors sets, it is easy to build and it contains those bad-looking minifigures.

Overall, ONLY get this set if you have a little boy that can't build the modern Pirate sets. Otherwise, it isn't really recommended.
